dongGoi: Hộp 10 vỉ x 10 viên, chai 100 viên, 200 viên, 500 viên
taDuoc: Lactose, Tinh bột mì, Avicel, Povidon, Natri croscarmellose, Natri lauryl sulfat, Magnesi stearat, Colloidal silicon dioxid,  Hydroxypropylmethyl cellulose 15 cP, Hydroxypropylmethyl cellulose 6cP, Polyethylen glycol 6000, Talc, Titan dioxyd, Màu Erythrosin lake
